Title: Modifies what constitutes obstruction to a driver's view or driving mechanism
Summary: Modifies what constitutes obstruction to a driver's view or driving mechanism; provides that the hanging of air fresheners and other devices from the rearview mirror is explicitly permitted.
LawCode: Amd ยง1213, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to modifying what constitutes obstruction to a driver's view or driving mechanism
